name: Opicaltray Island
description:
A game where you start as an innocent man who was pushed from a ship by a madman and has to explore an island. In the future, we will accept donations but this unfortunately has to be delayed due to the quarantine.

Thanks to pixabay for providing us with the beautiful background image. pixabay.com/photos/moorea-french-polynesia-tropical-680039/

Please note that if you run the game without extracting it, the background image will not show up and instead you will see a dark blue background. The same will happen if you delete the image or rename it.

Made by Andrew27

Tested by Sam122
